parrafos.main: I‚Äôm passionate about technology and always open to new challenges. I enjoy analyzing problems and finding practical solutions that turn ideas into tangible results. I thrive in collaborative environments and aim to add value at every stage of development. If you're looking for someone with a problem-solving mindset and a willingness to learn, I‚Äôd be happy to work with you.
parrafos.proyecto1: PixieStore is a modern and intuitive platform designed to simplify the search and download of high-quality images, similar to popular services like Pexels or Pixabay. With an optimized search engine, users can explore a vast visual catalog, download high-definition images, or save them to their personalized collections.
parrafos.proyecto11: This project was developed using advanced technologies such as ReactJS for a smooth and dynamic user experience, and Sass for a clean and responsive design. Additionally, I integrated state management functionality with Redux, and leveraged AWS cloud services to manage the project infrastructure and ensure optimal scalability. Data extraction and consumption is handled through APIs, ensuring that content is always up-to-date and of high quality.
parrafos.proyecto2: Hotel Miranda is a web platform designed for customers to easily and quickly book rooms at the luxurious Hotel Miranda. With an elegant and functional interface, users can explore different room options, check availability, and make personalized reservations effortlessly.
parrafos.proyecto22: This project was developed using HTML5, Sass, and JavaScript, combining a modern, responsive design with a smooth and dynamic user experience. Hotel Miranda stands out for its performance, simplicity, and customer-focused approach, ensuring that every booking is a hassle-free experience.
parrafos.proyecto3: Dashboard Hotel is an administration platform designed specifically for the managers of Hotel Miranda. This advanced tool allows adding, editing, and deleting employees, rooms, reservations, and managing customer messages coming from the Hotel Miranda project. Administrators can centrally manage reservations, processing customer requests in real-time as messages, directly linked to the hotel‚Äôs booking platform. The main dashboard offers a clear and functional view of the reservation calendar, where entry and exit dates, daily occupancy, and room statuses can be easily managed. This streamlines decision-making and ensures precise tracking of the hotel‚Äôs daily operations.
parrafos.proyecto33: Built with modern technologies like React, Styled Components, TypeScript, Redux, Express, Node.js, and MongoDB, Dashboard Hotel provides a robust, dynamic, and secure environment. API creation and consumption ensure the platform is flexible and scalable, offering a fast and tailored experience to meet the hotel's needs.
parrafos.proyecto4: Oxygen Shop is a landing page designed to showcase a product clearly and attractively, highlighting its features and price. Users can get all the necessary information at a glance, presented in a visually impactful and organized way.
parrafos.proyecto44: Developed with HTML5, Sass, and JavaScript, Oxygen Shop offers a modern, responsive experience, ensuring the product looks great on any device. With an intuitive and smooth design, this page combines style and functionality to provide simple and efficient navigation.
parrafos.obj1: I excel in React and modern frameworks for fast and smooth interfaces.
parrafos.obj2: Robust and scalable APIs with Node.js and Express. The engine behind the web!
parrafos.obj3: From SQL to NoSQL, I handle data efficiently and securely.
parrafos.obj4: Automation, CI/CD, and server deployment to keep everything running smoothly.
parrafos.obj5: I prioritize keeping everything safe with security best practices and encryption.
parrafos.obj6: Unit and integration testing to ensure nothing breaks.
